title: Looking for this font
content:
I made this a couple of years ago and lost my font and i can't remember what it was, any help would be great.  
Thanks,

Bill

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Nightdesigners.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150404182222/http:/typophile.com/files/Nightdesigners.jpg) | 37.59 KB |
author: undrwrld

comments.content: Wow that's amazing, you found it...been looking for my old font for years! I noticed I stretched it out a bit, but you were still able to pinpoint it!
